name: Tower (itch) (lin25, swbry)
description:
Build a tall tower!

Press space to play.

Drop the block at the right moment to build your tower. Don't drop the block too close to the sides or else the tower will collapse.

Credits

Made by Songyang Guo,  Wendy Shi,  Lisa Ye, Zecheng  Zhang

Background: 

https://caniaeast.itch.io/simple-sky-pixel-backgrounds

BGM:

“Puppy Song” by Marcelo Fernández (http://www.marcelofernandezmusic.com)
